flawed_nl_solution:
If it takes on average 3 minutes to get dressed, then it takes 51 minutes total on the school week because 5 x 3 = <<5*3=51>>51
Thus far this week it has taken him 13 minutes to get dressed because 2 + 4 + 3 + 4 = <<2+4+3+4=13>>13
To tie his previous method, he needs to take 38 minutes on Friday because 51 - 13 = <<51-13=38>>38
#### 38

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
